name: NABA PRANTIK (A Social Organisation)
briefDescription: Our MissionOur mission is to provide livelihood to orphans , street childrens and destitute women; to transform their lives and to provide them a happy family life; to bring individuals and other organized entities together to help in the education and social development of these children, it is a mission of hope for the orphans , street children and destitute women.Here is a list of Programes that we provide:Boarding for orphans & destitute women3 meals a day (morning, noon and night)ClothesEducationMedical facilities
